DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of multiple doses of LXR in healthy adults.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluation LXR-623 in Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy adults. Liver function tests, triglycerideres, and creatinine must be below upper limit of normal at screening. A history or active presence of clinically important medical disease. Any metal implants or devices. Claustrophobia.
